name: Samuel L. McGHEE, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Samuel L. McGHEE, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John J. O’Brien, Michael D. Ward, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Harold H. Cramer, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
509 A.2d 1255
Samuel L. McGHEE, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 14, 1986.
Decided May 29, 1986.
John J. O’Brien, Michael D. Ward, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Harold H. Cramer, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
